Description:
Linlithgow Distillery Limited - PN - PN/GA/CEMHD1A/301121/01

You have failed to ensure that the risk of fire and/or explosion has been eliminated or reduced, so far as is reasonably practicable, in that you have failed to ensure adequate ventilation of your distillation equipment, and failed to ensure that all electrical ignition sources are suitably ATEX rated in the distillation area
